instructions.title: Running app
instructions.description: type: 'yarn start'. It will show you the QR code to scan once setup.

instructions.title: Scan QR code
instructions.description: Install expo app from playstore. And scan the QR code from that app. If everything is setup properly. You should be seeing these contents in the app

instructions.title: Folder Structure
instructions.description: In your project root an 'app' folder exists. In the app folder 'actions', 'components', 'containers', 'store' and 'reducers' folder are structured.

instructions.title: Create your first action
instructions.description: The action is a basic function called from the component whenever we want the whole state of the app to be changed. Action creator is a simple function returning an object (the action itself)with a type attribute expressing what happened with the app.

instructions.title: Create your first reducer
instructions.description: Reducers are the ones in charge of updating the state of the app. Redux will automatically pass the current state of the app and the action occurred. It’s up to the reducer to realize if it needs to modify the state or not based on the action.type.

instructions.title: Create your component
instructions.description: In your components folder create a js file just like 'Home.js'

instructions.title: Learn about Store
instructions.description: Store basically stores the information. We have used redux-thunk middelware.

instructions.title: Link it all together
